overview: Mr. Steel is an innovative and entrepreneurial leader with extensive biotechnology business development, finance, and operational experience. He has been responsible for partnerships with several of the worldâ€™s premier biopharmaceutical companies, including Biogen Idec, Bristol-Myers Squibb, GlaxoSmithKline, Pfizer, and Roche, and for corporate financings in excess of $100 million. Prior to joining Anaphore, Mr. Steel was the Chief Executive Officer and co-founder of Rincon Pharmaceuticals, a privately held biotechnology company that was acquired in July 2008. Prior to Rincon, he was head of corporate development at Ambit Biosciences, a biotechnology company engaged in the discovery and development of small-molecule kinase inhibitors for the treatment of cancer. Mr. Steel is a graduate of Dartmouth College and the Marshall School of Business at the University of Southern California, and holds the designation of Chartered Financial Analyst.
